wikitext.*:
The '''Goodenough family''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] family. Little is known about the Goodenough family.

==Members==
The only known member of the Goodenough family is [[Ivy Goodenough]] who married [[Buffo Boffin]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Like many hobbit family names, the meaning behind Goodenough is easy to discern, being a combination of "good" and "enough".{{references}}
